Arco Design Pencil Library (.pen)

# Official Documentation
- Pencil Design-as-Code: https://docs.pencil.dev/
- Arco Design React: https://arco.design/react/docs/introduce
- Design Tokens: https://arco.design/react/docs/token

# .pen Component Catalog
The following files are located in `arcoui/components/` and contain reusable design components.

## General
- button.pen: Core button components with all variants (primary, secondary, etc.)
- link and badge.pen: Link styles and badge indicators.
- tags.pen: Various tag styles.
- tooltip.pen: Tooltip and popover variants.

## Layout & Display
- card.pen: Card structure with header, body, and footer sections.
- list.pen: List items and list containers.
- description.pen: Description list components.
- feedback.pen: Alert, message, and result components.
- breadcrumb.pen: Breadcrumb navigation paths.
- timeline.pen: Timeline items and layouts.

## Navigation
- menu.pen: Vertical and horizontal menu structures.
- tabs.pen: Tab navigation components with active states.
- pageheader.pen: Standard page headers.

## Data & Forms
- table and form.pen: Comprehensive table structures and form field components.
- Cascader.pen: Multi-level selection components.
- calendar.pen: Calendar and date picker visuals.
- upload.pen: File upload area and status indicators.

## Templates
- template.pen: High-level page layout templates and mockups.

# Design Resources
- Project: Arco Design React (ArcoUI)
- Source Format: Pencil .pen (version 2.6)
- Layout Engine: Pencil Auto Layout (Flexbox compatible)
